ygData.subject: Aradune is THE GM Guys...chill out !
ygData.msgSnippet: Brad is one of the people that MADE EQ...Aradune is his flagship character ...he doesn t HAVE to earn his experience OR his equipment.  Word has it that
ygData.messageBody:
Brad is one of the people that MADE EQ...Aradune is his 'flagship' character
...he doesn't HAVE to 'earn' his experience OR his equipment. Word has it
that brad also plays a 'real' ranger character that he actually
PLAYS...getting his own equipment, having to earn his own experience.
All the whining about Brad shouldn't THIS and Brad shouldn't THAT is a bunch
of BS.
Brad spent the last three or four YEARS of his life working on this game!
(For all of you that aren't QUITE sure....that's REAL LIFE years!!! :)
If any of you spent 3-4 years of your life working to develop a product, are
you saying you wouldn't take advantage of USING that product? PLEASE!!!
If Brad wants to go kill a WAY high level NPC, or slay a dragon, don't ya
think he's EARNED that right? We wouldn't even be having this discussion if
it weren't for Brad's dedication to this GAME (please try and remember that
it a game!!).
There has been SO much stuff (magic equipment, quests, skill and magic
tweaks) added to the game in the last couple of weeks, and all you guys can
argue about is why the Avenger is Paladin Only? I play a bunch of different
characters, and I love playin them ALL. I know I could get to the upper
levels faster if I just stuck to one character, but I'm having FUN.
My suggestion is this: if its FUN for you to argue about why Brad's lvl 50
Ranger can use a Paladin-Only Fiery Avenger, than go ahead and argue. But
if you like the world that Brad created, than cut the guy a little slack -
AND GO PLAY THE GAME!!!
Thoradin of Bristlebane

-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther [mailto:itzkurt@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 27, 1999 11:42 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 36


From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>

Just so yall know.. Aradune is not decked out as he was in beta. BETA
was just that.. BETA. In release, he's just as watched as the rest of
us. He has to earn everything just like the rest of us. He may be high
lvl (i don't know) but i assure you he's not packin anything he didn't
earn. As for the green splinted platemail.. I talked to a lvl 48
cleric and he said his group still had a couple levels to go before they
could make a run at getting some of it.
